__e: All I see are the lies and the violence, and... how it's changed you.
- I felt he knew something, and I... thought I could learn as much from the lies as from the truth.
Whatever you've done, and whoever these people are, the time for lies is over.
Yet these lies from our babes' mouths are but trifles to them.
After the lies your boyfriend told you, surely you're on my side.
After all the lies I've told for you, you owe me that!
